text: We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Saul #Gloucester #GL2 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 19:30. Fiona
All customers affected by the #powercut in #EX16 #Tiverton now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.   Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Tiverton #EX16 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 06:00. Geraint
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Wellingborough #NN9 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Wellingborough #NN9 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 23:30. Andi.
All supplies to #Bulwell #NG6 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in #Bulwell #NG6 area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 04:00. Ellie
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Weldon #NN17 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Ellie
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in the #Weldon #NN17 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 20:00. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
There is currently a #powercut in #NN17 #Weldon & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 12:30.  Siân
Power is now back on in #Newport #NP20 areas.  We are sorry for any problems caused by the #powercut this morning.
We are sorry about the #powercut in #Newport #NP20 and surrounding areas.  Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 02:00.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #ST17 #Stafford area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #ST17 #Stafford & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 15:00.  Siân.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #TA24 # Minehead area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
Update #powercut #Minehead #TA24 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 10:00. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #Minehead #TA24 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 05:30. Geraint
We are aware that properties are without power in #Truro #TR2 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 15:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
We are aware that properties are without power in #Truro #TR2 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 14:00. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
Apologies for the #powercut in #Southam #CV47 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 07:00. Geraint
